definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
1992 Consensus, statement issued after 1992 talks between PRC and Taiwan representatives, asserting that there is only one China

sentences.english: A common vocabulary or common understanding can help all in communications.
sentences.chinese: 一套公共詞彙或共識可以全方位幫助溝通。

sentences.english: Both sides share many consensuses in international affairs.
sentences.chinese: 在國際事務中有許多共識。

sentences.english: The United States and the North Korean Government have reached understanding on the disposition of DPRK related funds frozen at Banco Delta Asia.
sentences.chinese: 美朝政府就澳門匯業銀行凍結朝鮮資金問題達成共識。

sentences.english: Can say this word condensed the consensus that entire party fluctuates.
sentences.chinese: 可以說這句話凝聚了全黨上下的共識。

sentences.english: Decisions are made by consensus at the weekly meeting.
sentences.chinese: 決議通過週會的共識產生。

sentences.english: China and the EU have many consensuses on major international and regional issues.
sentences.chinese: 中歐雙方在重大國際和地區問題上有許多共識。

sentences.english: China is ready to work with Russia to implement the consensus reached at the session.
sentences.chinese: 中方願同俄方一道，推動對話會議的共識落到實處。

sentences.english: This process provides the basis and structure to support consensus building and joint decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 整個過程建立了制定決策所需的共識和基礎。

sentences.english: Share a characteristic about yourself thatyou have in common with the audience.
sentences.chinese: 分享你和聽衆的共同點，創造和諧和共識。

sentences.english: Preparatory meetings have made considerable progress in reaching agreement on some of the key issues.
sentences.chinese: 在籌備會議中，我們已就一些關鍵項目，取得共識。

sentences.english: These and similar groups begin with a plea for budget discipline.
sentences.chinese: 這些擁有相同共識的團體請求預算的紀律性。

sentences.english: Nowadays, protection of ecology and environment has become a world consensus.
sentences.chinese: 當今生態環境保護已成爲國際社會的共識。

sentences.english: Second, consolidating consensus and jointly promoting the healthy development of multilateral trade system.
sentences.chinese: 第二，凝聚共識，共同推進多邊貿易體制健康發展。

sentences.english: Premier Wen held in-depth talks and reached wide consensus with Turkish leaders.
sentences.chinese: 溫總理同土方領導人深入交談，達成廣泛共識。

sentences.english: Presently, coordination principle of human-environment relations has become the global mutual recognition.
sentences.chinese: 當前，人地關係的協調論已成爲全球共識。

sentences.english: Mr Conti said he hoped to have agreement on a deal by June.
sentences.chinese: 孔蒂表示，他希望在6月前就協議達成共識。

definition: to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
